lead_paragraph: The unanimous decision hurts prominent institutions like Cincinnati, Connecticut and Houston, which desire entry to a Power 5 conference.

headline.print_headline: Big 12 Decides to Remain at 10 Teams
headline.main: Big 12 Says No to Expansion, Dashing the Hopes of Intrigued Colleges

snippet: The unanimous decision hurts prominent institutions like Cincinnati, Connecticut and Houston, which desire entry to a Power 5 conference....
abstract: Big 12 Conference declines to expand its ranks beyond 10 teams, jilting almost two dozen schools aspiring to elite level of college sports; has struggled with stability, having lost several teams to other conferences, but still promises high revenues for members.
